meta.content: OnePurpose is a TK through grade 5 public, non-profit charter school disrupting the cycle of poverty by delivering educational excellence to low-income students in San Francisco, CA.
One Purpose School | San Francisco Elementary School: TK-Grade 5
OnePurpose is a TK through grade 5 public, non-profit charter school disrupting the cycle of poverty by delivering educational excellence to low-income students in San Francisco, CA.

link.title: One Purpose School » Home Comments Feed

div.p: Disrupting the cycle of poverty in San Francisco by preparing its students to graduate from college.

p.style: font-family: 'Arial Rounded MT Bold', 'Nunito', sans-serif; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4; font-size: 42px;

div.p: More than a school, a community that is changing lives.

h1.span: OnePurpose School is closing effective 6/30/2020. For information about enrolling in public schools, contact Joe@onepurposeschool.org

p.style: font-family: 'Arial Rounded MT Bold', 'Nunito', sans-serif; text-align: center; line-height: 1.3em; font-size: 30px;

div.p: OnePurpose School is a free public charter school serving children living in southeast San Francisco. For the 2019-20 school year, we offer transitional kindergarten to grade 5.

a.span: Our first graders are working so hard during their

img.alt: Our first graders are working so hard during their #differenciatedlearning block! 👍🏼
We love our #afterschool partnership with @bgcsf! Our scholars are proud of all their work they are learning there!

a.span: Buddy reading is a great way for our older scholar

img.alt: Buddy reading is a great way for our older scholars to practice their reading skills! Check out our 2nd grade scholar reading to some of the Kindergarten students.

a.span: These kiddos are nervous and excited today! 🤩 .

img.alt: These kiddos are nervous and excited today! 🤩 . . . Why you ask❓ We are here in #sacramento and presenting to the state for our #charterrenewal! . . . ⭐️ What advice do you want to give to our awesome scholars before their 1 min speeches?

a.span: Our 3rd grade scholars went to @moadsf today! The

img.alt: Our 3rd grade scholars went to @moadsf today! They loved exploring the “Black is Beautiful” exhibit. 🤩

a.span: Our 4th grader is feeling so proud about all the f

img.alt: Our 4th grader is feeling so proud about all the facts she knows about Dr. Martin Luther King! ❤️

a.span: We are so excited to be studying photography at ou

img.alt: We are so excited to be studying photography at our after school program with @bgcsf! We can’t wait to show you our final product!

font-family: 'Arial Rounded MT Bold', 'Nunito', sans-serif; text-align: center; line-height: 1.5; font-size: 23px; color: #444444;

div.p: OnePurpose School is in the Bayview, where 82% of children live in poverty and historically fewer than 10% have gone on to graduate from college. We are changing this trajectory for our students.
